quotes.quote: Confidence is the sexiest thing a woman can have. It's much sexier than any body part.
Elegance and smartness is the sexiest thing woman can have, not just the flesh.
Sexiness is all about your personality, being genuine and confident, and being a good person.
Power is sexy, not simply in its own right, but because it inspires self-confidence in its owner and a shiver of subservience on the part of those who approach it.
You can be fat and still be sexy. It all depends on how you feel about yourself.
Being sexy is something inside, and not everybody has it.

The sexiest thing in the entire world is being really smart. And being thoughtful. And being generous. Everything else is crap! I promise you! It's just crap that people try to sell to you to make you feel like less. So don't buy it. Be smart, be thoughtful, and be generous.
'Sexy' doesn't have to come with the price tag of being dumb.
Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
Sex appeal is 50% what you've got and 50% what people think you've got.
You can be covered and be very sexy. It's not what you show; it's what you have in mind, the way you cross your legs, the way you talk to people.
A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
Being sexy is something inside, and not everybody has it.
Sexy is kind of like an aura around someone.
Sexy is the attraction that is given as an encomium to women or men, or the capacity to attract the attention of the opposite sex because of their physical attributes.
No matter what a woman looks like, if she's confident, she's sexy.
Sexiness should not be overt. Something shapeless that drapes across your hip, hangs off the shoulder; something that cowls in the front, drapes low in the back, that's sexy.
You don't have to be naked to be sexy.
Confidence is the sexiest attribute a woman can have. If you feel good, you'll look good.
Fashion cannot make you sexy. Experience makes you sexy. Imagination makes people sexy. You have to train yourself, you have to study, and you have to live your life.
Being sexy is not about what's on show, it's all about suggestion, or insinuation. I'm interested in the way a garment hangs on a woman's body and the way it moves when she moves.
Don't be scared to be intelligent. Knowledge is sexy and powerful.
Sexiness is about being an individual and having conviction about what that is.
Confidence is sexy!
Intelligence is enormously sexy.
'Sexy' is being independent, being confident and having fun.
Nothing is sexier than confidence. Nothing.
My idea of sexy is that less is more. The less you reveal the more people can wonder.
Sexiness comes with maturity.
Eccentricity is what's sexy in people.
